articles.content:
Raf Simons is closing his eponymous label after 27 years.
Announcing the news on Monday via a brief statement on Instagram, the Belgian-born fashion designer revealed that the brands spring/summer 2… [+2275 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Nicholson
articles.title: David Baddiel: Jews Don’t Count review – a doc so shocking it sounds like a siren - The Guardian
articles.description: In this fascinating and timely film, the comedian corners Jewish celebrities to discuss antisemitism – and David Schwimmer reveals he has ‘never felt white, ever’
articles.content: A year ago, David Baddiel made a documentary about social media and online trolling for the BBC. Inevitably, Jews Dont Count (Channel 4) which is a much more robust film covers some of the same groun… [+4847 chars]
